tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: Legal Entity Identifier Taxonomy
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: This taxonomy provides a standard concept and datatype for including Legal Entity Identifiers in XBRL Reports. Formula validation ensures that the identifiers have a valid checksum. In additional, formula validation will ensure that any entity identifiers defined using a scheme of "http://standards.iso.org/iso/17442" are in the correct format, and pass checksum validation.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Legal Entity Identifier
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: Element, item type and associated formula rules for enforcing format and checksum of Legal Entity Identifiers.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Legal Entity Identifier (required primary identifier)
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: Referencing this entry point will enforce that all facts in the instance are reported using an LEI with the correct scheme ("http://standards.iso.org/iso/17442").

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: LEI formula functions
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: Entry point providing LEI formula functions only. These can be used to check the LEI format and checksum. Implementers will need to incorporate these into their own formula assertions.
